mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') AS `year_month`, COUNT(*) AS count FROM blog_posts WHERE del_flag = '0' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') DESC
select blog_id,title,summary,created_at from blog_posts where del_flag = '0' AND DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') = #{date}
select * from blog_posts where del_flag = '0' and blog_id = #{articleId}

SELECT blog_Id, title, CASE WHEN content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') THEN SUBSTRING(content, GREATEST(LOCATE(#{keyWord}, content) - 40, 1), 80 + LENGTH(#{keyWord}) ) ELSE summary END AS summary, created_at FROM blog_posts WHERE del_flag = '0' AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%'))
